name: nature-of-code-solutions
description: Personal solutions for exercises from [Nature of Code](http://natureofcode.com/) ([github](https://github.com/shiffman/The-Nature-of-Code)). Runs in [p5.js](https://p5js.org) and [ProcessingJS](http://processingjs.org/) since I'm working on a Chromebook and my SSH client does not seem to support X-Forwarding.
author: quinox
